ItemTooltips.vladmir: After getting vladimir, go for Roshan. If you want a safe Roshan kill, use smoke before going in to avoid wards.
ItemTooltips.heart: Get this if you want to become tanky and last longer in battles
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar:
Get this after shadow blade if the enemy team have many disablers or annoying spell casters.

* not necessary if enemy team doesn't have annoying disabler
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Get this if enemies got a lot of damage dealers
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Only get if enemy team got heroes that can dodge attacks.
ItemTooltips.basher:
* Must have item for late game

Get this after shadow blade if the enemy team doesn't have many disablers. With ursa's overpower attack speed, Skull basher would prevent any enemy from escaping.
ItemTooltips.lesser_crit: Get this after Skull Basher / BKB. This gives you a way higher damage and faster kills.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword:
* Must have item

Some people choose blink over shadow blade. However, I truly believe that shadow blade is a much better choice. Unlike blink, you can get close to the enemy without them seeing you anywhere and you get an instant kill.

AbilityTooltips.ursa_earthshock: Get 1 level of this at level 3 to slow down enemies. This makes killing a lot easier
